Espectacular. Sigue la línea del primer capítulo e incluso lo supera. El modo cooperativo es la clave para disfrutarlo al máximo. Las cámaras no decepcionan en ningún momento y los puzzles suponen un reto que se incrementa de manera razonable hasta el éxtasis. 

Y lo más importante. La historia de Aperture es una pasada.

Fantástico, não é melhor descrição do que fantástico.
Revolucionou a industria dos games e continua sendo referencia em história e jogabilidade.
Volta e outra sempre volto a jogá-lo para relembrar da sensação fantástica que é jogar essa obra prima.
Eines der besten Spiele.
Fun to play solo and with freind in co-op, so I rate it full 5/7.
This game has awesome coop for two players. Had a lot of fun.

Ein geniales Puzzel-Spiel und eine gelungene Fortsetzung von Portal.
Es geht wieder, mit einer Potalkanone bewaffnet, durch Testkammern und Räumlichkeiten des Aperture Science Enrichment Center. Irgendwie Hab ich GlaDOS ein bisschen vermisst.
Welches Geheimnis sich wohl im Keller verbigt?
Ein tolles neues Feature ist der Koop-Modus, in dem die Tests nur als Team bestanden werden können.
Mehr will ich aber auch garnicht verraten.
Das Spiel hat, meiner Meinung nach, die "Test der Zeit" Auszeichnung verdient da das Spielprinzip absolut zeitlos ist und ich es schon mehrere male durchgespielt habe und immer noch Klasse finde.

The “Villain Most In Need Of A Hug” Award goes to... GLaDOS!
GLaDOS FOR THE POTATOEST HUG!
Отличное продолжение отличной игры. Головоломка, в которую можно играть вдвоем! (но, наверное, все уже и так это знают ;) )
I love this game and the community levels are fantastic. This is a game i can always just pick up and play.

My go-to pick for favorite game of all time since I can't find any faults with it. Amazing setting, smooth and unique gameplay, and writing that is far too good to have any business in a physics-based puzzle game. Somehow Valve accomlished what I thought was impossible, creating a puzzle game that doesn't lose all replayability after you know the answers to all the puzzles. In fact, it might even get better the second time through as you start to dig into the game's setting and lore.

1-year edit: Still holds up.
Possibly one of the best games I have ever played in my almost-40 years of life.  Fun, funny, and fantastic.

This game, like others I've played and enjoyed, thoroughly execute a weirdly-strewn-together story that just makes sense once you implement the later parts of the game (before re-arriving at the top of the center). The boss battle was a bit more dissapointing than I'd like to anticipate, but I appreciated it nonetheless, and it's earlier stages before the boss foreshadowed the ending boss battle.
Игра моей молодости, в которую я с удовольствием поиграю и в старости (если доживу =))

This game is hilarious and funny. Filled with tricky puzzles and dialouge sure to make you laugh i recomend this game to anyone.

Pravděpodobně jedna z nejlepších logických her co jsem kdy hrál, přeplněná zábavnými momenty především díky Wheatlymu a GlaDos, která má navíc valmi zábavný multiplayer a bohatý příběh.

Świetna gra, szkoda że Valve nie produkuje już gier. Kampania bardzo wciągająca, coop bardzo rozbudowany i w miarę długi. Po przejściu fabuły i coopa nadal możemy przechodzić zagadki dzięki Workshopowi. A tam? Ponad pół miliona map. Portal 2 wciągnął mnie bardziej od samego Half Life 2. Bardzo polecam.

I think the greatest, or one of the greatest puzzle games of all time. Lots of funny humor, good story, great voice-acting and dialogue. Puzzles are mostly not too easy or too hard and are satisfying to solve. Definetely recommended.
Must have.
Amazing game, really regret not playing it earlier. Awesome story and well-written characters.

Absolutely stellar. This game deserve all the praise it gets. Valve listened to its fans and answered with a Portal game that delivered:
-A longer, more fleshed out story
-More memorable characters
-Better graphics
-Longer gameplay compared to the first game
-Online/splitscreen multiplayer
-A free -and amazing-DLC for the multiplayer part of the game
Absolutely worth it, even if you pay full price fot it

Una historia buenísima, unos puzles divertidos e impresionantes. juegazo 10/10

There comes a time in a man's life where he must make a choice that will change his life for the better or for the worse. For me it arrived Summer 2015 when I was but a wee lad and decided to spend my allowance and purchase portal 2. I had played the original portal and while I derived a reasonable amount of enjoyment from it, I was left empty, hollow, almost as if there was something missing. I lived with this feeling for a couple years until finally playing portal 2. It then dawned on me what it was all these years left wondering and like a light at the end of the tunnel it was there right infront of my face. While I'll keep the specifics of my realization a mystery I will say that you can only stay a boy for so long.
9/10

O jogo é simplesmente foda. Fazendo com que o raciocinio funcione a 100%, ele me atraiu de uma forma diferente, pois possui um estilo meio FPS de locomoção, porem, totalmente voltado ao pensamento logico e agilidade, já que muitas vezes há adrenalina, e isso fica melhor ainda em um jogo Online. Mas ele iria superar as minha espectativas se tivesse um modo VS, seria muito da hora.
